flavorText: "If you don't hit your adversaries while they're down, they might get up again."

foreignData.flavorText: „Wenn du nicht auf deine Gegner einschlägst, während sie am Boden liegen, stehen sie vielleicht wieder auf."
foreignData.name: Peitschmeister
foreignData.text: {T}: Der Peitschmeister fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl soviel Schaden zu, wie ihr in diesem Zug bereits zugefügt wurde.

foreignData.flavorText: "Si no golpeas a tus adversarios mientras están en el suelo, podrían levantarse."
foreignData.name: Guardián del látigo
foreignData.text: {T}: El Guardián del látigo hace a la criatura objetivo una cantidad de daño igual al daño que ya recibió ella este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Si vous ne frappez pas vos adversaires quand ils sont à terre, ils risquent de se relever. »
foreignData.name: Celui qui garde les fouets
foreignData.text: {T}: Celui qui garde les fouets inflige à la créature ciblée autant de blessures que les blessures qui ont déjà été infligées à la créature ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: "Se non colpisci il tuo avversario mentre è a terra, potrebbe anche rialzarsi".
foreignData.name: Fustigatore
foreignData.text: {T}: Il Fustigatore infligge a una creatura bersaglio un ammontare di danni pari ai danni che le sono già stati inflitti in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: "Se não acertares teus adversários enquanto eles estão caídos, eles podem reerguer-se."
foreignData.name: Guarda-Açoite
foreignData.text: {T}: Guarda-Açoite causa à criatura alvo uma quantidade de dano igual à já causada a ela neste turno.

name: Whipkeeper
originalText:
oc
T: Whipkeeper deals damage to target creature equal to the damage already dealt to it this turn.

rulings.text: If the creature regenerated during the turn, and thereby had all damage on it removed, the damage before it regenerated was still dealt that turn and will be counted.
This counts all damage that was dealt during the turn. This does not include any damage that was prevented.

text: {T}: Whipkeeper deals damage to target creature equal to the damage already dealt to it this turn.
